title: (x) UPS & Maplin corporate faces - FF Dax rip-off, AG Schoolbook {Jan E, Angel}
content:
Hi Folks.

Just wondering what typeface 'UPS' are now using in their identity.  
 [http://www.ups.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141122090442/http:/www.ups.com/ "http://www.ups.com/")

also would like to know what typeface 'Maplin' has been rebranded in.  
 [http://www.maplin.co.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141122090442/http:/www.maplin.co.uk/ "http://www.maplin.co.uk/")

Cheers

Andy
author: andy19at

comments.content: UPS: Created by FutureBrand, the font is called UPS Sans, but to many of our eyes, it is an adaptation of FF Dax. Perhaps "adaptation" is the kindest way of putting it.

ups: FF Dax (probably customized)

maplin: Chalet from House

Cheers Folks. Legends!

..however i have seen variations of the UPS typeface about.  
Hence why i was queerying.. like here [http://www.randgroupltd.com/images/linpave-logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20141122090442/http:/www.randgroupltd.com/images/linpave-logo.gif "http://www.randgroupltd.com/images/linpave-logo.gif")

cheers
I don't think Maplin's is Chalet from House mate.
nope.. not that either dude. cheers for responding tho mate.
Are you talking about just the Maplin logo or the titles as well? I'm not sure they're the same face.
